verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Jesus Jesus dearest Lord
Forgive me if I say
For very love
Thy sacred name
A thousand times a day

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O Jesus Lord
With me abide
I rest in Thee
Whate'er betide
Thy gracious smile is my reward
I love - I love Thee Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I love Thee so
I know not how
My transports to control
Thy love is like a burning fire
Within my very soul

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For Thou to me art all in all
My honor and my wealth
My heart's desire
My body's strength
My soul's eternal health

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Burn burn O love within my heart
Burn fiercely
Night and day
Till all the dross of earthly loves
Is burned and burned away

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
O light in darkness joy in grief
O heav'n begun on earth
Jesus my love
My treasure
Who can tell
what Thou art worth

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
What limit is there to this love
Thy flight
Where wilt Thou stay
On on our Lord is sweeter far
Today than yesterday
